name: Kim Possible: What's the Switch?
summary:
From the days of the PlayStation 2, this downloadable game allows you to play the classic original on compatible PlayStation game systems.

Kim Possible and her perennial nemesis Shego must grudgingly team up to bring everything back to normal when the minds of Dr. Drakken and Ron Stoppable are switched in this action-packed adventure. It's now up to Kim and Shego to save the daytogether.
info:
• 中文名: 麻辣女孩：开关是什么？
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 发行日期: 2006年10月19日
  • 发行: Buena Vista Games
  • 开发: Artificial Mind and Movement
